ygData.msgSnippet: Veratis scans detect the pod, Foxfingers contacts Veratis. The instructions are to send Ice to investigate. Lunarpine overhears the instructions and feals

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Veratis' scans detect the pod, Foxfingers contacts Veratis. The instructions
are to send Ice to investigate. Lunarpine overhears the instructions and
feals prompted to go along. "That's my old territory, I'm going too."
Foxfingers tries to argue that the instructions were to only send Icebird
but as always there would be no argueing with the big bad wolf. He exits and
waits for Ice. two drones float out to meet them.

"Strap these onto your back, it'll make your flight go a little quicker."
the fox says feeling obligated to help his teammates out. Ice transformed to
her half robot, half polarbear mode and had Lunarpine attach the drone to
her back for her, her bear claws made it difficult to do any detailed
holding or moving.

Lunarpine helped her out, then attached his own. They checked thier DNA
scanners and flew off into the wild blue yonder across the big blue ocean to
the big blue land of Canada (I know it's not blue but it worked with the
post.)
----- Original Message -----
From: Beast Wars <beastwars@...>

Sent: Thursday, June 07, 2001 7:15 AM
Subject: Re: Say Welcome to Grizzltron


�Grizzltron�


   Grizzltron Remmembers about something he forgot.  He Runs out the cave
and grabs some of the scanning equipment in the stasis Pod.  He than Drops a
Proximaity Mine(Blows up when movement is around) in it.  He than runs in
the cave.  He starts to scan for any bot coming.
